column4: if you dont want to use a password use keys, it's more secure but you can only log in remotely from whatever machine have their ssh keys configured
Okay, that is called "passwordless ssh" also, right?
should I generate the key on server 1 (the one i need to connect to the other) or on server 2?
I have a guide that will help you set up your passwordless ssh login, if youre interested
